description:
Typical average monthly gas bills for residential, commercial and industrial customers.  Customer usage is in Therms or CCF.  
-Residential customer bills are shown for usages of 0, 10, 20, 50, 100, 200, 300, and 400 CCF or Therms.  
-Commercial and Industrial customer bills are shown for usages of 10,000, 100,000, and 1,000,000 CCF or Therms.

metadata.attribution: New York State Public Service Commission

name: Typical Utility Bill Information Gas: Beginning 2011
